ValidationRule.description: Ensures critical documents are marked as required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Type__c, "Contract"), Is_document_required__c = FALSE, OR( CONTAINS(UPPER(Name), "PURCHASE"), CONTAINS(UPPER(Name), "AGREEMENT"), CONTAINS(UPPER(Name), "TITLE") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This type of contract document should typically be marked as required
